title: How to set up a wallpaper that doesn't fit?
content: So I'm trying to use a picture as a wallpaper, except it's not big enough for the screen. So when I manually resize the image to fit the screen, it ends up zoomed in and not centered. Taking a screenshot doesn't work either because the top bar appears and it ruins the image. So, what can I do?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
